ygData.subject: RE: PoF pulling
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Well thats my point, once cazic learns you are in the pof, he starts willy nilly zapping people. The trick is to not let him know you are the in the zone,
ygData.messageBody:
>Think for a moment. If CT *really* had a death touch, what
>would he do the moment he discovered mortals were messing
>around in his realm? DT all of them. Isn't that what *you'd*
>do if you were playing CT? If you want a balanced (i.e. fun)
>game, you can't go willy nilly giving mobs all sorts of
>super-powers.
>
>--
>John H. Kim
>kim@...
>


Well thats my point, once cazic learns you are in the pof, he starts willy
nilly zapping people. The trick is to not let him know you are the in the
zone, and that means being very carefull about not creating situations
where autopull happens and letting mobs get away that know you are in the zone.
